Traveled with Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin. Met with Foreign Minister Toshimitsu Motegi and Defense Minister Nobuo Kishi in a "2+2" meeting. Also met with Prime Minister Yoshihide Suga.
Traveled with Defense Secretary Austin. Met with Foreign Minister Chung Eui-yong and Defense Minister Suh Wook in a "2+2" meeting. Also met with President Moon Jae-in.

Met with Foreign Minister Sophie Wilmès, President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen, High Representative of the European Union Josep Borrell and NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg. Also attended a NATO Foreign Ministerial meeting.

Traveled with Defense Secretary Austin to consult with NATO Allies and partners on a range of shared priorities. Held bilateral and multilateral meetings with European counterparts to discuss key priorities and shared challenges.
Met with President Ashraf Ghani and Chairman of the High Council for National Reconciliation, Abdullah Abdullah.
April 15, 2021

Attended the G7 Foreign and Development Ministers’ Meeting. Met separately with Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab and Prime Minister Boris Johnson, as well as Foreign Minister Toshimitsu Motegi of Japan and Foreign Minister Chung Eui-yong of South Korea.
Met with President Volodymyr Zelensky and Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba.
Met with Queen Margrethe II, Crown Prince Frederik, Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen and Foreign Minister Jeppe Kofod.

Met with President Guðni Th. Jóhannesson, Prime Minister Katrín Jakobsdóttir and Foreign Minister Guðlaugur Þór Þórðarson. Also attended the Arctic Council Ministerial meeting to discuss key priorities and address the threats of the climate crisis.
Met with Prime Minister Múte Bourup Egede and Foreign Minister Pele Broberg.
Met with Foreign Minister Simon Coveney.
Met with President Reuven Rivlin, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Foreign Minister Gabi Ashkenazi.
Met with President Mahmoud Abbas and Prime Minister Mohammad Shtayyeh.
Met with President Abdel Fattah el-Sisi and Foreign Minister Sameh Shoukry.
Met with King Abdullah II and Foreign Minister Ayman Safadi.
Met with President Carlos Alvarado Quesada and Foreign Minister Rodolfo Solano. Also attended a Central American Integration System (SICA) meeting.
Carbis BayAccompanied President Biden to the 47th G7 summit in Cornwall. Also met with Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab of the United Kingdom and Foreign Minister Chung Eui-yong of South Korea.
Accompanied President Biden to the 31st NATO summit and the EU–U.S. summit. Also participated in a signing ceremony with Prime Minister Edi Rama on 4G and 5G security
Accompanied President Biden to the summit meeting with President Vladimir Putin. Also met with President Guy Parmelin and Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis.
Met with Chancellor Angela Merkel and Foreign Minister Heiko Maas. Also attended the 2nd Berlin Conference on the 2021 Libyan general election.
Met with President Emmanuel Macron, Foreign Minister Jean-Yves Le Drian and OECD Secretary General Mathias Cormann.

Bari, MateraMet with President Sergio Mattarella, Prime Minister Mario Draghi and Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio. Blinken co-chaired a meeting of the Global Coalition to Defeat ISIS and participated in a Syria Ministerial. Also attended the G20 Foreign Ministers' Meeting.
Met with Pope Francis, Cardinal Pietro Parolin and Archbishop Paul Gallagher.
Met with Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Minister of External Affairs S. Jaishankar and National Security Advisor Ajit Doval.
Met with Sheikh Nawaf Al-Sabah, Prime Minister Sabah Al-Khalid Al-Sabah, Foreign Minister Ahmed Nasser Al-Mohammed Al-Sabah and Speaker Marzouq Al-Ghanim.
Met with Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani and Foreign Minister Mohammed bin Abdulrahman bin Jassim Al Thani.
September 6–8, 2021
Met with Foreign Minister Heiko Maas and attend a Ministerial on Afghanistan.
September 8, 2021

Attended the Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) ministerial alongside U.S. Special Presidential Envoy for Climate John Kerry, U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai, Chair of the Council of Economic Advisers Cecilia Rouse, and Under Secretary of State for Economic Growth, Energy, and the Environment Jose W. Fernandez.
October 4–6, 2021
Attended the U.S.–Mexico High Level Security Dialogue with Mexican counterparts.
October 7–8, 2021
Met with President Guillermo Lasso and Foreign Minister Mauricio Montalvo.
October 19, 2021
Met with President Iván Duque and Vice President Marta Lucía Ramírez.
October 20–21 2021
Accompanied President Biden and met with Pope Francis at the Apostolic Palace.
October 28, 2021
Accompanied President Biden to the 2021 G20 Rome summit.
October 29–31 2021
Accompanied President Biden to the 2021 United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP26).

Met with President Uhuru Kenyatta and Secretary Raychelle Omamo.
November 15–18, 2021
Met with President Muhammadu Buhari, Vice President Yemi Osinbajo, and Foreign Minister Geoffrey Onyeama.

Met with President Macky Sall and Foreign Minister Aïssata Tall Sall.
November 19–20, 2021
Met with President Egils Levits, Prime Minister Arturs Krišjānis Kariņš, and Foreign Minister Edgars Rinkēvičs. Also attended the NATO Foreign Ministerial.
November 29–30, 2021

Met with Prime Minister Magdalena Andersson and Foreign Minister Ann Linde. Also attended the Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe (OSCE) Ministerial Council, during which he met with several counterparts from OSCE member states, including Ukrainian Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba and Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov.

Attended the G7 Foreign and Development Ministers' Meeting.

Met with President Joko Widodo and Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi.

December 15–16, 2021
Met with President Volodymyr Zelensky and Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba.
